Fit.rationale: Strong product + operator with enterprise and consumer AI exposure, proven to scale teams (up to 140), drive GTM and P&L growth, and advise investors/boards via private equity experience. Gaps: no explicit founder/CEO seed-fundraising track record, limited evidence of direct Generative AI product delivery (beyond feature-level ML), and no stated mental-health or regulated-healthcare experience.
Fit.recommendation: Position as a product-led, operator-CEO/Co‑founder with deep experience scaling AI-enabled consumer products and driving GTM; emphasize Silver Lake investor-facing work, Move Inc ML product leadership, early-stage startup experience (33Across), and ability to operationalize POC→market. Be explicit about fundraising readiness and ask targeted questions to surface prior investor interactions.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Senior/executive roles (CPO, EVP, Operating Executive) but no explicit founder or CEO title.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Emphasize early-stage & Series B leadership at 33Across

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No bullets describing raising seed/VC rounds or leading investor closes.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add (if true) - Ask candidate for specifics before claiming.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Silver Lake: partnered on product, AI and technology strategy; Move Inc: machine learning features.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Mirror JD (Generative AI) and specify model/stack only if candidate confirms.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: No healthcare or mental-health specific roles or projects listed.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add (if true) - Ask for any mental-health or healthcare project details.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Experience taking POC to market / product development iteration (High)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Move Inc: re-imagined consumer experience and ML features; 33Across: conceived and built new product lines.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Emphasize POC→market work where applicable.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Led 140-person team at Move Inc; led 90-person team at Financial Engines; recruited/coached 10+ execs at Silver Lake.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Highlight remote/ distributed team experience if applicable.

Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Move Inc: monetization and user growth; Financial Engines: omnichannel marketing and conversion improvements.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Use JD terms (GTM, ICP, acquisition) to mirror role.
Ask - Clarify any regulated-industry exposure before claiming.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Investor / VC network in tech or mental health (Med)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Operating Executive at Silver Lake implies investor interactions but network not specified.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Add (if true) - Request investor/advisor network details to include.
Ask - Probe for relevant compliance work or oversight experience.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Located / willing to travel to SF Bay Area (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Resume locations: Cupertino, Menlo Park, Santa Clara; current based in Cupertino, CA.

Gap_Map.JD Requirement/Keyword: Experience with early-stage customers & iterative onboarding (Low)
Gap_Map.Where/Evidence: Notes on iterating products with customers at portfolio companies; 33Across product launches.
Gap_Map.Gap handling: Rephrase - Emphasize customer feedback loops and onboarding process if specific examples exist.

Questions: Have you ever led or closed a seed or early-stage funding round? If yes, list round (seed/Series A), amount raised, year, and your role (lead/co-founder/executive).
Describe your direct Generative AI / ML product work: what models, your role (PM/owner/partner), team size, and commercialization stage (POC, pilot, production)?
Do you have any professional experience in mental health, healthcare, telehealth, or regulated health products? If yes, give brief examples (project, role, impact).
What else should I know about you and this job?
